column1: EVTNAMEmoduscarolimagni.6002;A New Caliph;A New Caliph;A New Caliph;;A New Caliph;;;;;;;x;;
EVTDESCmoduscarolimagni.6002;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has assumed the rule of the Arabian Empire... and now it falls to you to decide whether you will accept [From.GetHerHis] rule
column2: or whether you will cease to pay taxes and declare independence.;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has assumed the rule of the Arabian Empire... and now it falls to you to decide whether you will accept [From.GetHerHis] rule
column3: or whether you will cease to pay taxes and declare independence.;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has assumed the rule of the Arabian Empire... and now it falls to you to decide whether you will accept [From.GetHerHis] rule
column4: or whether you will cease to pay taxes and declare independence.;;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has assumed the rule of the Arabian Empire... and now it falls to you to decide whether you will accept [From.GetHerHis] rule
column5: or whether you will cease to pay taxes and declare independence.;;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTOPTAmoduscarolimagni.6002;The [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] will find its own path;The [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] will find its own path;The [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] will find its own path;;The [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] will find its own path;;;;;;;x;;

column2: and all of ours;[From.GetSheHeCap] is my Caliph
column3: and all of ours;[From.GetSheHeCap] is my Caliph
column4: and all of ours;;[From.GetSheHeCap] is my Caliph

column2: \nIt is my position that the Arabian Empire is a legacy deserving of the likes of the Righteous Caliphs of Old
column3: and requires a ruler of sufficient substance and character to earn its support. I believe that ruler is not you
column4: and thus the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] hereby declares its independence from the empire. We will find our own way from this day on.\n[From.GetTitledName];My [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]
column5: \nIt is my position that the Arabian Empire is a legacy deserving of the likes of the Righteous Caliphs of Old
column6: and requires a ruler of sufficient substance and character to earn its support. I believe that ruler is not you
column7: and thus the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] hereby declares its independence from the empire. We will find our own way from this day on.\n[From.GetTitledName];My [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]

column9: and requires a ruler of sufficient substance and character to earn its support. I believe that ruler is not you

column11: \nIt is my position that the Arabian Empire is a legacy deserving of the likes of the Righteous Caliphs of Old
column12: and requires a ruler of sufficient substance and character to earn its support. I believe that ruler is not you
column13: and thus the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] hereby declares its independence from the empire. We will find our own way from this day on.\n[From.GetTitledName];;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTNAMEmoduscarolimagni.6004;The Arabian Empire;The Arabian Empire;The Arabian Empire;;The Arabian Empire;;;;;;;x;;
EVTDESCmoduscarolimagni.6004;The rule of the Arabian Empire is not an easy thing to hold. Its vassals are notoriously independent
column2: and as each generation of rulers gets further from Muhammed
column3: their memory of what the rule stands for grows more distant. For now
column5: your rule appears to be safe.;The rule of the Arabian Empire is not an easy thing to hold. Its vassals are notoriously independent
column6: and as each generation of rulers gets further from Muhammed
column7: their memory of what the rule stands for growns more distant. For now
column9: your rule appears to be safe.;The rule of the Arabian Empire is not an easy thing to hold. Its vassals are notoriously independent
column10: and as each generation of rulers gets further from Muhammed
column11: their memory of what the rule stands for growns more distant. For now
column13: your rule appears to be safe.;;The rule of the Arabian Empire is not an easy thing to hold. Its vassals are notoriously independent
column14: and as each generation of rulers gets further from Muhammed
column15: their memory of what the rule stands for growns more distant. For now
column17: your rule appears to be safe.;;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTNAMEmoduscarolimagni.6005;End of the Arabian Empire;End of the Arabian Empire;End of the Arabian Empire;;End of the Arabian Empire;;;;;;;x;;
EVTDESCmoduscarolimagni.6005;Though you recently assumed the Arabian rule
column2: there are far too many who consider the rule to exist only in name. To them
column3: the commands of the Caliph are meaningless. The once-great empire of Muhammed has fallen to chaos.;Though you recently assumed the Arabian rule
column4: there are far too many who consider the rule to exist only in name. To them
column5: the commands of the Caliph are meaningless. The once-great empire of Muhammed has fallen to chaos.;Though you recently assumed the Arabian rule
column6: there are far too many who consider the rule to exist only in name. To them
column7: the commands of the Caliph are meaningless. The once-great empire of Muhammed has fallen to chaos.;;Though you recently assumed the Arabian rule
column8: there are far too many who consider the rule to exist only in name. To them
column9: the commands of the Caliph are meaningless. The once-great empire of Muhammed has fallen to chaos.;;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTOPTAmoduscarolimagni.6005;No! This cannot be!;No! This cannot be!;No! This cannot be!;;No! This cannot be!;;;;;;;x;;
